Structs/Attribute.html.abstract: A key used to describe Relation schemes and map keys to values in Row.

Structs/Row.html.name: Row
Structs/Row.html.abstract: A single entry in a Relation. Conceptually, the same as Dictionary<Attribute, RelationValue>.
